topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587a0786368725ef60004fc#post_5587a0786368725ef60004fc
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5587a01a6368725b05000461#post_5587a01a6368725b05000461
I hear China is running out of water.[/bq]
Large scale desertification.


Since global warming has started 300k die a year.  To crunch the numbers as simple as possible whenever a mass extinction climate wise starts there's these points where they call it "extinction events" where all hell breaks loose; in three generations we're going to see one.  By 2030 100million people will die due to global warming.

To make it as blunt as humanly possible: 1 to 3 billion dead by 2100.


Mainland China in the long run is fucked cause the amount of desertification + how their economy is pretty much a joke long term stability wise = they're going to slide back into 3rd world state in a couple decades.

Southern part of USA such as Texas and that + California is fucked in the long run.

Middle east + North half of Africa is definitely fucked.


There is no hope for middle east peace cause as water dries out then you can probably guess.

Imagine the wars by desperate hungry thirsty people.


Honestly that's why I really am hopeful about technology cause I'm hoping that doesn't happen; I'm hoping we develop synthesized food or such cause then people don't have to die.
